results.title: Poly(Acrylic Acid)-Modified MoS2 Nanoparticle-Based Transdermal Delivery of Atenolol
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@Atenolol@@@ (@<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@ATE@@@) is a @GENE_ADRB1 @GENE_153 @@@beta1-adrenergic receptor@@@-blocking agent used to treat @DISEASE_Cardiovascular_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D002318 @@@cardiovascular diseases@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Hypertension</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@.

results.title: Development, Evaluation, and Molecular Docking of Oral Dissolving Film of Atenolol
results.text_hl: The development of oral dissolving film (ODF) of @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ is an attempt to enhance convenience and compliance for geriatric @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ suffering from @<m>DISEASE_Hypertension</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@.

results.title: Atenolol increases dental mineralization in male offspring of treated hypertensive rats and normotensive rats.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@Atenolol@@@ increases dental mineralization in male offspring of treated @<m>DISEASE_Hypertension</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertensive@@@ @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ and normotensive @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@.

results.title: Effect of Blood Pressure Reduction on Intraocular Pressure and Ophthalmic Artery Blood Flow Velocity in Hypertension.
results.text_hl: Purpose: To evaluate the effect of reducing blood pressure (BP) by @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Amlodipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ on (1) intraocular pressure (IOP) and (2) ophthalmic artery blood flow (OAF) velocity in new @<m>DISEASE_Hypertension</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertensives@@@.

results.title: Effect of long-term antihypertensive treatment on cerebrovascular structure and function in hypertensive rats

results.title: Derivatization-free conventional and synchronous spectrofluorimetric estimation of atenolol and amlodipine.
results.journal: Spectrochim Acta A Mol Biomol Spectrosc
results.text_hl: One of these effective combinations is @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@/@CHEMICAL_Amlodipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ which is usually administered to patients with @<m>DISEASE_Hypertension</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@.

results.title: Safety of preoperative carvedilol in a patient with recent atenolol-induced pheochromocytoma crisis and cardiomyopathy: A case report
results.text_hl: Based on the onset of @<m>DISEASE_Hypertension</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertensive@@@ crisis after a single dose of @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ and the huge right upper quadrant mass, a diagnosis of @DISEASE_Pheochromocytoma @DISEASE_MESH:D010673 @@@pheochromocytoma@@@ was suspected.

results.title: The fate of atenolol in wastewater treatment plants of representative densely urban agglomerations in China.
results.text_hl: ...@<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@Atenolol@@@ (@<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@ATL@@@) that can decrease heart rate and reduce @GENE_REN @GENE_5972 @@@renin@@@ release is extensively used in the treatment of @<m>DISEASE_Hypertension</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@, @DISEASE_Angina_Pectoris @DISEASE_MESH:D000787 @@@angina@@@, and other diseases.

results.title: Passive Cigarette Smoking Impact on Blood Pressure Response to Epinephrine and Felypressin in 1K1C Hypertensive Rats Treated or not with Atenolol
results.text_hl: Smoke significantly increased felypressin maximal @<m>DISEASE_Hypertension</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertensive@@@ response only in the @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@-treated group.
